articles.title: Tokyo Olympics: Satish Kumar shows his ‘Indian Army spirit,' earns respect from opponent Bakhodir Jalolov - India Today
articles.description: India's Satish Kumar bows out from the quarterfinals of his debut Games after putting up a fierce fight against reigning World and Asian champion Bakhodir Jalolov of Uzbekistan. Satish is India’s first super heavyweight (+91kg) boxer to compete in the Olympic…
